article_metadata.description: Critics of Waban 40B plan not ‘narrow-minded’Regarding the proposed development at Waban’s St. Philip Neri site, I am requesting a more respectful tone from those expressing opinions on the project. There has been stereotyping on both sides of the issue, but a few unfair generalizations by project advocates, in comments submitted to the city, have prompted this letter. Such attacks detract from the overall discourse and can even “bully” some into
